name: education-themes
title: Complete Educational Theme Collection
author: NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>
description: All three NOLA educational themes (Foundation, Pathways, Professional) for age-appropriate learning experiences

files.content:
{
  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema/registry-item.json",
  "name": "theme-foundation",
  "type": "registry:theme",
  "title": "Foundation Educational Theme",
  "description": "Age-appropriate theme for middle school learners (ages 11-14) with larger touch targets, higher contrast, and engaging visual elements",
  "categories": ["education", "theme", "foundation", "middle-school"],
  "author": "NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "cssVars": {
    "light": {
      "background": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "card": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "card-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "popover": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "popover-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "primary": "oklch(0.546 0.248 295.9)",
      "primary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "secondary": "oklch(0.637 0.195 259.5)",
      "secondary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "muted": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "muted-foreground": "oklch(0.40 0 0)",
      "accent": "oklch(0.641 0.257 8.1)",
      "accent-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "destructive": "oklch(0.671 0.212 39.0)",
      "destructive-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "border": "oklch(0.90 0.05 83)",
      "input": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "ring": "oklch(0.546 0.248 295.9)",
      "chart-1": "oklch(0.546 0.248 295.9)",
      "chart-2": "oklch(0.637 0.195 259.5)",
      "chart-3": "oklch(0.641 0.257 8.1)",
      "chart-4": "oklch(0.671 0.212 39.0)",
      "chart-5": "oklch(0.839 0.171 83.3)",
      "sidebar": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "sidebar-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "sidebar-primary": "oklch(0.546 0.248 295.9)",
      "sidebar-primary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "sidebar-accent": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "sidebar-accent-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "sidebar-border": "oklch(0.88 0.06 295)",
      "sidebar-ring": "oklch(0.546 0.248 295.9)",
      "radius": "0.75rem"
    }
  },
  "meta": {
    "educationalContext": {
      "ageGroup": "11-14",
      "cognitiveLevel": "middle-school",
      "touchTargetMin": "48px",
      "contrastRatio": "enhanced",
      "visualComplexity": "engaging",
      "wcagLevel": "AA"
    },
    "designTokens": {
      "fontSizeBase": "16px",
      "lineHeightBase": "1.6",
      "focusWidth": "3px",
      "borderRadius": "0.75rem",
      "minTouchTarget": "48px"
    },
    "colorPalette": {
      "primary": "Rich Purple - Engaging and authoritative",
      "secondary": "Bright Blue - Friendly and approachable", 
      "accent": "Electric Pink - Exciting and attention-grabbing",
      "destructive": "Orange Red - Clear warning signal",
      "neutral": "Amber Yellow - Warm and inviting"
    },
    "designPrinciples": [
      "Larger touch targets for developing motor skills",
      "Higher contrast ratios for easier reading",
      "Vibrant colors to maintain engagement",
      "Friendly rounded corners to reduce anxiety",
      "Clear visual hierarchy for cognitive development"
    ]
  }
}

{
  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema/registry-item.json",
  "name": "theme-pathways",
  "type": "registry:theme",
  "title": "Pathways Educational Theme",
  "description": "Age-appropriate theme for high school learners (ages 14-18) with modern design patterns and balanced visual hierarchy",
  "categories": ["education", "theme", "pathways", "high-school"],
  "author": "NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "cssVars": {
    "light": {
      "background": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "card": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "card-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "popover": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "popover-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "primary": "oklch(0.50 0.20 185)",
      "primary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "secondary": "oklch(0.40 0.25 270)",
      "secondary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "muted": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "muted-foreground": "oklch(0.45 0 0)",
      "accent": "oklch(0.65 0.30 25)",
      "accent-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "destructive": "oklch(0.65 0.28 20)",
      "destructive-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "border": "oklch(0.92 0.03 185)",
      "input": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "ring": "oklch(0.50 0.20 185)",
      "chart-1": "oklch(0.50 0.20 185)",
      "chart-2": "oklch(0.55 0.22 200)",
      "chart-3": "oklch(0.40 0.25 270)",
      "chart-4": "oklch(0.65 0.30 25)",
      "chart-5": "oklch(0.45 0.18 300)",
      "sidebar": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "sidebar-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "sidebar-primary": "oklch(0.50 0.20 185)",
      "sidebar-primary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "sidebar-accent": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "sidebar-accent-foreground": "oklch(0.15 0 0)",
      "sidebar-border": "oklch(0.90 0.04 185)",
      "sidebar-ring": "oklch(0.50 0.20 185)",
      "radius": "0.625rem"
    }
  },
  "meta": {
    "educationalContext": {
      "ageGroup": "14-18",
      "cognitiveLevel": "high-school",
      "touchTargetMin": "44px",
      "contrastRatio": "standard",
      "visualComplexity": "balanced",
      "wcagLevel": "AA"
    },
    "designTokens": {
      "fontSizeBase": "15px",
      "lineHeightBase": "1.5",
      "focusWidth": "2px",
      "borderRadius": "0.625rem",
      "minTouchTarget": "44px"
    },
    "colorPalette": {
      "primary": "Teal - Modern and trustworthy",
      "secondary": "Purple - Creative and inspiring",
      "accent": "Coral - Energetic and social",
      "destructive": "Warm Red - Clear but not alarming",
      "neutral": "Cool Grays - Contemporary and clean"
    },
    "designPrinciples": [
      "Modern aesthetics that appeal to teenagers",
      "Balanced visual hierarchy for complex information",
      "Contemporary color palette with social appeal",
      "Collaborative-friendly interface elements",
      "Career-exploration focused design patterns"
    ]
  }
}

{
  "$schema": "https://ui.shadcn.com/schema/registry-item.json",
  "name": "theme-professional",
  "type": "registry:theme",
  "title": "Professional Educational Theme",
  "description": "Sophisticated theme for post-graduate learners (ages 18+) with information-dense layouts and refined visual treatments",
  "categories": ["education", "theme", "professional", "post-graduate"],
  "author": "NOLA Education <team@nolaeducation.org>",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "cssVars": {
    "light": {
      "background": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "foreground": "oklch(0.12 0 0)",
      "card": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "card-foreground": "oklch(0.12 0 0)",
      "popover": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "popover-foreground": "oklch(0.12 0 0)",
      "primary": "oklch(0.25 0.15 230)",
      "primary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "secondary": "oklch(0.35 0.10 220)",
      "secondary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "muted": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "muted-foreground": "oklch(0.50 0 0)",
      "accent": "oklch(0.70 0.20 65)",
      "accent-foreground": "oklch(0.10 0 0)",
      "destructive": "oklch(0.62 0.22 15)",
      "destructive-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "border": "oklch(0.94 0.01 220)",
      "input": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "ring": "oklch(0.25 0.15 230)",
      "chart-1": "oklch(0.25 0.15 230)",
      "chart-2": "oklch(0.35 0.10 220)",
      "chart-3": "oklch(0.70 0.20 65)",
      "chart-4": "oklch(0.30 0.12 200)",
      "chart-5": "oklch(0.45 0.08 240)",
      "sidebar": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "sidebar-foreground": "oklch(0.12 0 0)",
      "sidebar-primary": "oklch(0.25 0.15 230)",
      "sidebar-primary-foreground": "oklch(0.95 0 0)",
      "sidebar-accent": "oklch(1 0 0)",
      "sidebar-accent-foreground": "oklch(0.12 0 0)",
      "sidebar-border": "oklch(0.92 0.015 220)",
      "sidebar-ring": "oklch(0.25 0.15 230)",
      "radius": "0.5rem"
    }
  },
  "meta": {
    "educationalContext": {
      "ageGroup": "18+",
      "cognitiveLevel": "post-graduate",
      "touchTargetMin": "40px",
      "contrastRatio": "precise",
      "visualComplexity": "information-dense",
      "wcagLevel": "AA"
    },
    "designTokens": {
      "fontSizeBase": "14px",
      "lineHeightBase": "1.4",
      "focusWidth": "1px",
      "borderRadius": "0.5rem",
      "minTouchTarget": "40px"
    },
    "colorPalette": {
      "primary": "Navy Blue - Authoritative and trustworthy",
      "secondary": "Slate Gray - Professional and neutral",
      "accent": "Gold - Premium and sophisticated",
      "destructive": "Muted Red - Clear but not disruptive",
      "neutral": "Cool Grays - Clean and efficient"
    },
    "designPrinciples": [
      "Information-dense layouts for efficiency",
      "Sophisticated color palette with premium feel",
      "Precise typography for extended reading",
      "Minimal visual noise to reduce cognitive load",
      "Professional aesthetics suitable for workplace"
    ]
  }
}
